markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Favorable Winds](/Feats.aspx?ID=2336) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Changeling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=212" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 23 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Virga May](/Feats.aspx?ID=2334)

</column>

---

You wrap a shell of favorable wind around a weapon you wield. On your next Strike with a ranged weapon before the start of your next turn, you don't take circumstance penalties on the attack roll due to wind. In addition, if that weapon has a [range increment](/Traits.aspx?ID=248) of 10 feet or less, increase its range increment by 10 feet for that Strike.
name: Favorable Winds
